job_history.work_description: Managed customer calls effectively and efficiently in a complex, fast-paced and challenging call center environment. Addressed and resolved customer product complaints empathetically and professionally. Defused volatile customer situations calmly and courteously.

Contributed to the overall success of the franchise through facility tours for potential new members, explaining promotions, and handling customer concerns and issues. Recruited, trained, and supervised staff of 12-15.

Assisted customers with account inquiries including questions, concerns, or other issues. Collected past due debts on delinquent accounts. Set up new customer accounts, including explaining, selling, and bundling services.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Over 7 years of experience in customer-facing roles, including managing customer calls, resolving complaints, and handling customer concerns, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Led teams in multiple roles, including supervising staff of 12-15 as a Club Manager and assisting as a Customer Service Team Lead, suggesting strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively managed customer calls, addressed customer complaints, and explained promotions, indicating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Resolved customer complaints, handled customer concerns, and defused volatile customer situations, suggesting strong proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed customer calls efficiently in a fast-paced call center environment, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Supervised staff of 12-15 as a Club Manager, indicating a solid level of proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Account Management
skills.explanation: Set up new customer accounts and collected past due debts on delinquent accounts, suggesting some practical experience in account management.
